name: 🍌│Banana Catcher│🍌
description:
Alpha available

Introduces a 2D Platformer game you can catch bananas, explore levels and solve puzzles. Sometimes there will be free updates in the game, so stay tuned for new content!! 🍌

Controls:

A - Walk left

D - Walk right

SPACE BAR - Jump/Double Jump

F - interact

Social Medias
